channel.title: 2024 Outlook on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in 2024 Outlook on FinanClub

item.title: SHOP
item.description: score:93 Chances: Shopify (SHOP) reached $74.51 at the closing of the latest trading day, reflecting a +1.48% change compared to its last close. Discover how Shopify’s groundbreaking Black Friday success indicates it’s ready for the beginning of a retail transformation. These consumer stocks had a great 2023, and the growth should continue into the new year.

item.title: ON
item.description: score:71 Chances: ON Semiconductor Corp. (ON) is expected to capture more than 25% of the silicon carbide market by the end of 2023. The stock market is likely to be volatile in 2024, and diligent investors will find opportunities. These stocks have growth potential in 2024 and over the next decade because of megatrend tailwinds.
